Extract adjacency matrix from a DAG skeleton.

Source: R/create-network.R
nc_adjacency_matrix.Rd

Is generally a wrapper around calls to igraph::get.adjacency() and igraph::igraph.from.graphNEL(). Transforms from a GraphNEL object in igraph.

nc_adjacency_matrix(.dag_skeleton)

Arguments

.dag_skeleton

The PC DAG skeleton object.

Value

Outputs an adjacency matrix of the DAG skeleton.

Examples


library(dplyr)
skeleton_estimate <- simulated_data %>%
  select(contains("metabolite")) %>%
  nc_create_network()

nc_adjacency_matrix(skeleton_estimate)
#> 12 x 12 sparse Matrix of class "dgCMatrix"
#>    [[ suppressing 12 column names ‘metabolite_1’, ‘metabolite_10’, ‘metabolite_11’ ... ]]
#>                                      
#> metabolite_1  . . . 1 1 . . . . . 1 .
#> metabolite_10 . . 1 1 . . . 1 1 . 1 .
#> metabolite_11 . 1 . . . . . . . . . .
#> metabolite_12 1 1 . . . 1 . . . . . .
#> metabolite_2  1 . . . . 1 . . . 1 . .
#> metabolite_3  . . . 1 1 . 1 . . . . .
#> metabolite_4  . . . . . 1 . 1 . . . .
#> metabolite_5  . 1 . . . . 1 . 1 . . 1
#> metabolite_6  . 1 . . . . . 1 . . . .
#> metabolite_7  . . . . 1 . . . . . 1 .
#> metabolite_8  1 1 . . . . . . . 1 . 1
#> metabolite_9  . . . . . . . 1 . . 1 .
